extendedInfo.description: Keeps track of your debts.*Item debts*Money debts*Send reminders*Move to SD*Partial payments*Due dates*Barcode scanner*Contacts from address book*Custom currencies*Backup to SDFor Ad-Free Version see "I.O.U Pro".

reviews.comment: I like it\'s functions, but the interface crashes a lot. Recovers OK. Droid X
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Just perfect.
reviews.comment: Easy to use, thorough, doesn\'t take up much room, and i can set reminders.  Exactly what i was looking for.  I\'ve had it for months and it has worked great the whole time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Brilliant software. Exactly what I was looking for; an excellent UI and management system. Lacks a backup system.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Exactly what I needed. But the ads Window maximize when data connection is off. It blocks the whole screen
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Add button
reviews.comment: Alway has to press menu before adding new entry. Would be nice if there\'s an add button on the screen itself.
reviews.author: Ashwin Gobin

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Been looking for an app like this for a while. For free u can\'t go wrong
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Now that what I was looking for
reviews.comment: It is super easy, comfort and cool. I have only 2 claims: you have to double tap to choose between debt/lending instead of 1 tap; the look of the interface is a little sad.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Simple & easy 2 use. Tq.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Almost Perfect
reviews.comment: If it had the ability to sync across all my other android devices, it would be perfect.  Nevertheless, pretty neat.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: High times..
reviews.comment: I use this app daily as I am in a supply and demand type business.. I can easily keep track of what I owe my dealer as well as what all my customers owe me.. my business would not be as successful without this app. Thanks
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Nice simple app. Great for tracking money or items borrowed or owed. I don\'t use cash often & this is excellent for simple cash record keeping
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Does what it says. App could benefit from more user-friendly functionality. Almost there!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love this app!!
reviews.comment: The functionality could be a little more user friendly, but other then that...AWESOME app! Now i can keep track of who owes and who i owe! Could even use this for a business!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love this app, just what I was looking for. Would pay for ad free version. htc wildfire
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works perfectly to keep track of my drug debits
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Everything works great except the fact that it crashes every time I tried using the scanner. I don\'t really mind tho cause everything else works fine
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very nice!!! Pls add \"total\" for \"coming due\"
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Great app, one suggestion though: maybe add a widget? Thanks ;)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: simple n easy. but with ad. will uninstall when found replacement. i hate ads.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Simple and does what it ,says minimal learning curve and hideous settings
reviews.author: A Google User
